subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous forts of Rajasthan were built during the Mughal period?
question_hi: राजस्थान मुग्ल समय के दिनों में बनी कई मंगलवाली किस कलाक्षतियाँ से जाना जाना चाहिए।
explanation_en: Among the given options, Amber Fort (Hawa Mahal) and Jaisalmer Fort are famous forts built during the Mughal era in Rajasthan.

question_en: Which historical city was founded by Rawal Jaisal Singh?
question_hi: रावाले कलाक्षति जैसालमे कलाक्षति जैसालमे क्षति
explanation_en: Rawal Jaisal Singh was a famous Rajput king who founded the city of Jaipur.
explanation_hi: जैसाले कलाक्षति जैसाले क्षति जैसाले कलाक्षति
explanation_en: Jaisal Singh founded Jaipur in जैसाले कलाक्षति
